div.head: 喉中腥氣
div.div: malodorous qi from within the throat

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: malodorous qi from within the throat

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with hou zhong xing chou 喉中腥臭 , malodorous stench from within the throat. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：知母、黃芩，並 瀉肺熱，喉中腥氣 , “ Zhi mu and huang qin , they both serve to drain lung heat and malodorous qi from within the throat ”.
